How CivicFlow Works

From report to resolution in five simple steps

1. Capture

Take a photo of the civic issue you encounter

2. AI Analyzes

Our AI classifies and assesses severity automatically

3. Admin Routes

Issue is assigned to the right department and worker

4. Worker Resolves

Worker completes the task with proof of work

5. Earn Incentives

You earn reward points and redeemable coupons

What You Can Report

From potholes to streetlights, we cover all civic issues

Potholes

Damaged roads and pathways affecting traffic

Waste Overflow

Overflowing garbage bins and waste management issues

Streetlights

Non-functional or damaged streetlights

Traffic Signals

Faulty traffic signals and road safety issues

Animal Carcasses

Deceased animals on roads requiring removal

Public Toilets

Unclean or damaged public sanitation facilities

Damaged Pathways

Broken sidewalks and pedestrian walkways

Other Issues

Any other civic concerns in your area

Why Choose CivicFlow

The benefits of using our platform

Faster Resolutions

AI-powered routing ensures issues reach the right department instantly

Transparent Tracking

Track your report status in real-time from submission to resolution

Earn Rewards

Get points for reporting issues and redeem government benefits

Safer Neighborhoods

Help make your community cleaner, safer, and more livable

Ready to Make a Difference?

Join thousands of citizens already making their communities better. Report your first issue today.
